item.title: The Tragedy of Antigone
item.description: #internetContent #mythology #randomKnowledge Article link: Antigone - Wikipedia related note: [[The Tragedy of Oedipus]] Antigone is a tragedy by Sophocles, written around 442 BCE.

item.title: The Tragedy of Oedipus
